source.methodName: public void addUserName(HttpServletRequest request, Model model)

sink.methodName: public void addUserName(HttpServletRequest request, Model model)

findings.description:
The user can send a userName over a request parameter. The addUserName method adds the userName into the trusted data without authenticating, therefore Trust Boundary Violation attack exist.

curl http://localhost:8080/login?userName=IAmAttacker
